channel.title: Help with First Timer
channel.description:
This is my first time making a server, i have the client and source and i think i have the correct java installed, hen i click run on the server, it says path could not be found.. It would be great if someone could help me out on teamviewer.
389 651 258
7097

item.title: Help with First Timer
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“jhon cena, post:5, topic:376189”]i wish i knew how to do that, im new at this. I have no idea what any of that is. Someone was helping me with it yesterday but lgged off…[/quote]ok then go learn how to program first. stop wasting your time.

item.title: Help with First Timer
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“jhon cena, post:3, topic:376189”][quote author=Liquid Magic link=topic=472122.msg3452521#msg3452521 date=1293850504]

This is my first time making a server, i have the client and source and i think i have the correct java installed, hen i click run on the server, it says path could not be found… It would be great if someone could help me out on teamviewer.

389 651 258

7097

your paths are not correctly set and your environmental variables are not set.
[/quote]

Right, i do that but it still doesn’t work for me. This is why i need someone to help me over teamviewer with getting that setup.[/quote]
ok if your environmental variables are correctly set then call you have to do is use an IDE or make this bat file:

@echo off
cd your src dir (delete this line if all of your files are in one folder)
java client
pause

if your compiler bitches about no argument, put this after the “java” part: -Xmx512m

Read full topic
